name: MEMBER_LANGUAGES
description: This MEMBER_LANGUAGES table contains information on the languages a member speaks, writes, or understands.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MEMBER_LANGUAGES_C_NAME
columns.description: The languages the member speaks, writes, or understands.
